Entry.JapaneseText: ……ったく、 うっとうしい霧だぜ……
霧の発生しやすい地形なんでしょうけど、 たぶんそれだけじゃないと思います。
Entry.EnglishText: While it is true that the local topography is rather prone to the formation of fog, I doubt it's the sole culprit here.

Entry.JapaneseText: 蒸気機関車が、モクモクとすごい蒸気を 出して走ってるんですよ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's a locomotive that blows off a lot of steam when it's running as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: 蒸気機関車か！ ウワサには聞いた事があるぜ！ すごいんだろ？ 乗れるかな？
Entry.EnglishText: A steam locomotive! I'd heard rumors about it! Is it super cool? We're going to ride it, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: この街を回るためには 必ず乗る事になると思うわ。
Entry.EnglishText: I thing we'll need to ride it if we're going to get around town.
